title: Mr forfee
author: Mr forfee
content: I think this guys are working on a national coin to compete against private market coins, what do u guys think?

comments.author: ultrloa
comments.body: Quote from: Mr forfee on December 20, 2024, 03:01:31 PM   I think this guys are working on a national coin to compete against private market coins, what do u guys think?  Ok will just give you a link so that you can read the history for sure you can learn a lot from this articles.For China https://www.investopedia.com/news/price-cryptocurrencies-totally-dependent-china/This one is for Saudi Arabia https://cointelegraph.com/learn/articles/legal-status-of-cryptocurrencies-in-saudi-arabia-and-qatarChina is working to control things and they cannot do it with Bitcoin that's why they try to create their own digital currency maybe to compete and gain total power on digital currencies industry. While in Saudi Arabia their government is just concern about its price volatility and other negative thing they think about Bitcoin. Maybe for now their leaders is skeptical about it, but for sure in future their would be a changes of their decision once Bitcoin will be widely acknowledged by other big countries.

comments.author: Mr forfee
